text: If $A = \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{pmatrix}$, find the adjoint of matrix A.
answer: The cofactors are $C_{11}=4, C_{12}=-3, C_{21}=-2, C_{22}=1$. The Adjoint is $adj(A) = \begin{pmatrix} 4 & -2 \\ -3 & 1 \end{pmatrix}$.
